data.description: Welcome to your new home, where style, comfort, and meticulous care converge to create the perfect living space. As you approach, the great curb appeal welcomes you with a striking gray facade accented by stone details and a spacious 3-car garage. The interior is a breath of fresh air, featuring light neutral colors that impart a sense of cleanliness, brightness, and spaciousness. Natural light floods the house, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere. The main level is adorned with new flooring installed in 2023. The foyer, complete with an entry closet, offers a welcoming introduction. A conveniently located half bathroom is easily accessible. The powder room received a stylish update in 2023, boasting a new vanity, mirror, and light fixture. Move seamlessly into the living room, where a cozy fireplace beckons, setting the scene for relaxation and warmth. This space flows effortlessly into the dining area and kitchen, where sliding doors open to a backyard deck, creating a perfect blend of indoor and outdoor living. The kitchen is a chef's delight, featuring custom granite countertops and an island updated in 2021, a mirror glass backsplash added in 2022, and stainless steel appliances, including a sleek vent hood. Recessed lighting throughout enhances the functionality and aesthetics, while updated light fixtures & ceiling fans add a modern touch to every room. Practicality meets convenience with a laundry room including storage and a mudroom entryway leading to the 3-car garage. Upstairs, the spacious second level offers a flexible lofted area, three generously sized bedrooms, and full bathroom in the hall. The primary suite is a retreat in itself, complete with attached bath and a spacious walk-in closet. The unfinished basement, with ample storage, is equipped with an egress window and is plumbed for another bathroom. This newer build home (2016) not only offers modern comforts but also a great location with a private yard backing into serene trees. Preferred lender offers discounted rate for this listing.
